author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1579: Debug logging of messages now clips body if its too big. Added Camel property to set max length or disabled it by setting it to 0 or -1.

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-985 Add BundleActivator managing the Abdera instance as
a ServletContext attribute and modify the AbstractAbderaHandler.getAbdera
methods to use the JSP PageContext instead of the servlet request.

author: jacopoc
msg: Fix for pagination error happening in the Global GL settings->Invoice Item Type screen, when you update a record and then try to paginate. Bug reported in OFBIZ-2517
